statements.statement: DELETE /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/bwkSpt/spsrInfMg/aT03SpsrAthHisChpHisPhsDelJob/AT03SpsrAthHisChpHisPhsDel/delSpsrAthHisChpHis */ FROM INSTC.TBGCBAT03 /* GCB책임자승인내역점검내역 */ WHERE 거래년월일 < ${작업기준년월일} AND ROWNUM <= 100

SELECT /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/bwkSpt/spsrInfMg/aT03SpsrAthHisChpHisPhsDelJob/AT03SpsrAthHisChpHisPhsDel/retvSpsrAthHisChpHisNcn */ COUNT(1) 건수_N10 FROM INSTC.TBGCBAT03 A /* GCB책임자승인내역점검내역 */ WHERE A.거래년월일 < ${작업기준년월일}
